A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved it. I went to see it a second time and enjoyed it even more. I feel this movie is getting a lot of hate because it’s not what people expected and it goes against the traditional Star Wars mold. They needed to do that to keep this thing going as they are planning for a ton of new movies. They needed to give the characters more depth and show the good guys can fail and show Star Wars wasn’t just about lightsabers. You just can’t win with people as so many were upset about TFA being a copy of a New Hope but then when they give them something new and refreshing\, people complain and get upset that it didn’t go the way they thought it would.
